mapper.sql: id , user_id, classify_id, catalog_id, tag, seat, timing_mode, setting_duration, actual_duration, status, note_content, note_path, note_status, start_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT sr.id, user_id, tag, actual_duration, note_content, note_path, note_status, start_time FROM study_record sr WHERE sr.status = 3 and sr.note_status = 1 AND sr.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT count(1) FROM study_record sr WHERE sr.status = 3 and sr.note_status = 1 AND sr.user_id = #{userId}

select sr.id, sr.user_id, sr.classify_id, sr.catalog_id, sr.tag, sr.seat, sr.status, sr.timing_mode, sr.setting_duration, sr.start_time, u.name, u.profile_path from study_record sr INNER JOIN user u on sr.user_id = u.id where sr.catalog_id = #{catalogId} and sr.status != 3

select sr.id, sr.user_id, sr.classify_id, sr.catalog_id, sr.tag, sr.seat, sr.status, sr.timing_mode, sr.setting_duration, sr.start_time, u.name, u.profile_path, c.name as catalogName, c2.name as classifyName from study_record sr INNER JOIN user u on sr.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN catalog c on sr.catalog_id = c.id INNER JOIN classify c2 on c.classify_id = c2.id where sr.id = #{recordId}
